pages.text: Throughout the $(thing)Underworld$(), many small lights can be seen, almost dancing. These lights are in fact the small fae known as $(thing)Fairies$(). Nimble though they are, slaying them will give yield their valuable $(item)Fairy Dust$().$(br2)Alternatively, one could catch them in an $(item)Empty Jar$() to use as a decorative light source.
